availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram D. Gentry (Jackson County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Son of Joseph Gentry and Nancy Gentry. Married to Araminta Bowman Gentry in Jackson County, Kentucky, on February 9, 1859. Attended school in Lee County, Virginia, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Lee County, District 31, p. 342A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, Sturgeon, p. 239B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, Pond Creek, p. 524D.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Jackson County Marriages, p. 203.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 16623.
